title: copypaste
extract: copy and paste - Computer Definition. To make a copy of a file, folder or selected text in another location. The phrase "cut and paste" is often used when the function is really copy and paste. See cut and paste, clipboard, Win Copy between windows, Copy and Xcopy.
extract_html: copy and paste - Computer Definition. To make a copy of a file, folder or selected text in another location. The phrase "cut and paste" is often used when the function is really copy and paste. See cut and paste, clipboard, Win Copy between windows, Copy and Xcopy.
